Node.Text: Hi! Can you gather some items from the maze for me? I need them to make a potion.
Great! I need 2 apples, 1 garlic, and 3 tomatoes.
Ok, no problem. Comeback if you change your mind.
Thank you! I'll wait here until you gather them all. You should be able to see them highlighted on the map.
Thank you for the items! Step through that portal over there to continue.
You have not gathered all the items yet. Come back when you have them all
